title: Access Emprez
content: To log in, you will need a username and password which will be provided to you by your supervisor or manager.Your profile allows you to use certain features and view specific information.Access for managersTo access Emprez managers use the following link: Management PortalAccess for employeesEmployees can access their personal space to view their schedules, view documents, and other functions ...To access it, they can go there via the following link: Employee Portal or on the mobile application via their mobile phone.Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
